author: jgm
content:
As it stands, validators leaking aren't enough to get us back to 67% participation so we are going to have to wait for validators to be kicked before we can regain finality.  That makes the math easier, as it's a race to 16.75 Ether.

A validator that has never been active started around 30 Ether, so expect the inactivity leak to take another 8 days or so to reduce its balance enough.  Validators that were active but now aren't may have ~31 Ether, so another day for the to go out.

That said, participation rate has increased over the past few days so we may limp up to 67%.  Personally I hope not, as a clean out of the inactive validators would be a good thing long-term.
